concepts.name: The Aether
concepts.description: The raw potential of creation and change that flows through all things. The fundamental substance of magic.
concepts.significance: Explains the existence and function of magic, connects all living things, determines the laws of reality
concepts.manifestation: Visible as ley lines, magical auras, spontaneous magical phenomena, and in places of power
concepts.rules: Cannot be created or destroyed, only transformed; follows conservation principles; responds to will and emotion
concepts.examples: Magic spells, enchanted items, magical creatures, ley line convergences
concepts.history: First theorized by elven sages 2000 years ago, proven by dwarven geomancers 500 years ago
concepts.practical_applications: Magic casting, enchanting, divination, teleportation, healing
